pkgmetadata.longdescription: Gibbs Sea Water Functions // Provides an interface to the Gibbs 'SeaWater' ('TEOS-10') C library, version 3.06-16-0 (commit '657216dd4f5ea079b5f0e021a4163e2d26893371', dated 2022-10-11, available at https://github.com/TEOS-10/GSW-C, which stems from 'Matlab' and other code written by members of Working Group 127 of 'SCOR'/'IAPSO' (Scientific Committee on Oceanic Research / International Association for the Physical Sciences of the Oceans).
